heading: ABOUT US
body: A population-based Birth Cohort Study will be conducted in the Western Province of Sri Lanka with a Maternal Health Enhancement (MHE) mobile application. The app includes AI predictive models capable of predicting preterm birth, low birth weight, preeclampsia, perinatal mortality, and postpartum depression in advance. MHE will deliver health advice/alerts directly to the pregnant mother's mobile phone through push notifications with simultaneous alerts for healthcare providers. AI models will also be used in data analysis.
